entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Calling SyntaxGenerator.Declaration on an explicit interface indexer implementation generates the wrong result #69284
  • Collection expression target-type not being used for nested spread expressions. #69277
    17.8
  • Find all references on generated file yields no results #69270
  • File rename that changes case crashes a NavBar and Semantic Classification #69269

Closed

  • File-local type doesn't "shadow" namespaces #68429
    17.8
  • LSIF indexing performance degraded #68750
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-33928.125 #69281
  • Possible null reference assignment should be ignored when destructuring with a discard #69263
    17.8
  • Scoped keyword emitted by SyntaxGenerator for out parameters #69213
  • ref struct: uninitialized ref field and no way to initialize it. #69151

PullRequests

Created

  • SyntaxGenerator handle explicit interface indexer #69285
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Fix auto-default behavior when value-assigning a ref field #69283
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Update rule ID for 'Unnecessary call to Set.Contains' #69282
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • WIP: not ready for review. #69280
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add analyzer/fixer to update expressions like `Array.Empty<T>()` over to using the `[]` collection expression. #69279
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Preserve formatting when converting array-expressions to collection-expressions. #69278
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Also downgrade corehost to normal queue to avoid issues in new VS version #69275
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Implement by-ref lambda params without type name #69273
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Check fo both csharp and visualbasic in IsCSharpOrVisualBasicSuperSet #69271
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Implement LSP debug test commands #69267
    Area-IDE, LSP, untriaged

Merged

  • Allow File-local type to shadow a namespace declaration in a different file #69254
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Reuse the workspace to better take advantage of caches when indexing #69268
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Update "use collection initializer" to use a collection-expression if the user prefers that form. #69219
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Update PublishData.json after M2 snap #69276
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Remove hardcoded value in tagger #69274
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Improve and clarify the logic when speculatively comparing old/new code to ensure semantics are the same. #69261
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Only use scoped for ref parameters #69220
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Add more `ref readonly` tests and address comments #69183
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters, Next
  • Fix `ref readonly` mismatch retargeting #69205
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters, Next

Updated

  • Honor Concord's TruncatedString flag to reduce memory usage #68969
    Area-Interactive, Community, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: use inline array for ReadOnlySpan<T> argument to builder method #69227
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Update Versions.props for 17.8 P2 #69260
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • F1 help for `#if` and `#else` refers to preprocessor symbols, not `if_CSharpKeyword` and `else_CSharpkeyword` #69192
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Only Left and returnValue gets checked for dynamic in signature #69214
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, 17.8
  • Cache extension methods on binder #69172
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Backlog
  • Cache SubstitutedNamedTypeSymbol.GetMembers to avoid unnecessary allocations #69164
    Area-Compilers, Community, 17.8
  • Remove newly doc'd rules #69259
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Check both csc.exe and vbc.exe as filename to exclude #69221
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Workaround vsix deployment issue in local build #69266
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
